dc_title_s: Kaisei Nihon yochi rotei zenzu : zōshū teihon / Nagakubo Genju.; Preface title: Shinkoku Nihon yochi rotei zenzu
dc_description_s: Shows administrative divisions (provinces, counties, capitals of fiefs), roads, historical places, and temples. Also shows distances between ports. Cover title. Originally engraved on wood block in An'ei 4 [i.e., 1775], with title: Shinkoku Nihon yochi rotei zenzu. Wood block print. Printed on Japanese paper. Oriented with north toward the upper right. Relief shown pictorially. Includes explanatory notes. 1 map : col. ; on sheet 85 x 133 cm., folded in covers 29 x 17 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
